00021 #ifndef _GridControlData_HEADER_
00022 #define _GridControlData_HEADER_
00023 
00024 /*! \file GridControlData.h This file provides interfaces to store information in a GRC (grid control) file.
00025  */
00026 
00027 #include <cstring>
00028 #include <string>
00029 #include <vector>
00030 //
00031 
00032 namespace affymetrix_grid_control
00033 {
00034 
00035 /*! This structure provides a feature coordinate definition. */
00036 typedef struct _FeatureCoordinate
00037 {
00038         /*! The X cooridnate. */
00039         int x;
00040 
00041         /*! The Y cooridnate. */
00042         int y;
00043 
00044 } FeatureCoordinate;
00045 
00046 /*! This class provides interfaces to store GRC file information. */
00047 class GridControlData
00048 {
00049 public:
00050         /*! Constructor */
00051         GridControlData() {};
00052 
00053         /*! Destructor */
00054         ~GridControlData() { Clear(); };
00055 
00056 protected:
00057         /*! An array of coordinates for the B1 probes. */
00058         std::vector<FeatureCoordinate> probesB1;
00059 
00060         /*! An array of coordinates for the B2 probes. */
00061         std::vector<FeatureCoordinate> probesB2;
00062 
00063         /*! An array of coordinates for the non-synthesized features. */
00064         std::vector<FeatureCoordinate> probesNS;
00065 
00066         /*! The number of columns of features on the array */
00067         int arrayColumns;
00068 
00069         /*! The number of rows of features on the array */
00070         int arrayRows;
00071 
00072 public:
00073         /*! Gets the number of rows.
00074          * @return The number of rows.
00075          */
00076         int GetRows() const { return arrayRows; }
00077 
00078         /*! Sets the number of rows.
00079          * @param rows The number of rows.
00080          */
00081         void SetRows(int rows) { arrayRows = rows; }
00082 
00083         /*! Gets the number of columns.
00084          * @return The number of columns.
00085          */
00086         int GetColumns() const { return arrayColumns; }
00087 
00088         /*! Sets the number of columns.
00089          * @param columns The number of columns.
00090          */
00091         void SetColumns(int columns) { arrayColumns = columns; }
00092 
00093         /*! Resizes the B1 array.
00094          * @param size The size of the array.
00095          */
00096         void ResizeB1(int size) { probesB1.resize(size); }
00097 
00098         /*! Resizes the B2 array.
00099          * @param size The size of the array.
00100          */
00101         void ResizeB2(int size) { probesB2.resize(size); }
00102 
00103         /*! Resizes the NS array.
00104          * @param size The size of the array.
00105          */
00106         void ResizeNS(int size) { probesNS.resize(size); }
00107 
00108         /*! Sets the B1 probe at the given index.
00109          * @param index The index of the array.
00110          * @param coord The new coordinate.
00111          */
00112         void SetB1(int index, FeatureCoordinate coord) { probesB1[index] = coord; }
00113 
00114         /*! Gets the B1 probe at the given index.
00115          * @param index The index of the array.
00116          * @return coord The coordinate.
00117          */
00118         FeatureCoordinate GetB1(int index) const { return probesB1[index]; }
00119 
00120         /*! Gets the number of B1 probes.
00121          * @return The number of B1 probes.
00122          */
00123         int GetNumB1Probes() const { return (int) probesB1.size(); }
00124 
00125         /*! Sets the B2 probe at the given index.
00126          * @param index The index of the array.
00127          * @param coord The new coordinate.
00128          */
00129         void SetB2(int index, FeatureCoordinate coord) { probesB2[index] = coord; }
00130 
00131         /*! Gets the B2 probe at the given index.
00132          * @param index The index of the array.
00133          * @return coord The coordinate.
00134          */
00135         FeatureCoordinate GetB2(int index) const { return probesB2[index]; }
00136 
00137         /*! Gets the number of B2 probes.
00138          * @return The number of B2 probes.
00139          */
00140         int GetNumB2Probes() const { return (int) probesB2.size(); }
00141 
00142         /*! Sets the NS probe at the given index.
00143          * @param index The index of the array.
00144          * @param coord The new coordinate.
00145          */
00146         void SetNS(int index, FeatureCoordinate coord) { probesNS[index] = coord; }
00147 
00148         /*! Gets the NS probe at the given index.
00149          * @param index The index of the array.
00150          * @return coord The coordinate.
00151          */
00152         FeatureCoordinate GetNS(int index) const { return probesNS[index]; }
00153 
00154         /*! Gets the number of NS probes.
00155          * @return The number of NS probes.
00156          */
00157         int GetNumNSProbes() const { return (int) probesNS.size(); }
00158 
00159         /*! Clears the member objects. */
00160         void Clear() {
00161                 probesB1.clear();
00162                 probesB2.clear();
00163                 probesNS.clear();
00164                 arrayColumns=0;
00165                 arrayRows=0;
00166         };
00167 
00168         
00169 };
00170 
00171 };
